original_title: Under Construction 2: A Journey into The Dark Side of Bodybuilding
overview: Dave "The Freak" Crosland in his last ever big cycle attempts to push his body beyond its physical limit by embarking on a 12 week experiment to increase his muscularity to a body weight of over 400lbs, putting his health, wellbeing and this time even his personal relationships on the lineâ€¦
title: Under Construction 2: A Journey into The Dark Side of Bodybuilding
